page.title: 04Memorys of Boskenwyn School
page.content: The school opened in 1877.From 1897-1900 there were approxmately 105 children attending Boskenwyn school. The reason for this large number was that children stayed on until they were 14 or 15.Now in 1985 there are 55 children. 1970-present Mrs Simmonds During the time that Mrs Simmonds has been here she learnt to shut her eyes to"apparent chaos." Mr Rose Mr Rose was very easy to get to know he was always dressed up smart and wearing Italian shoes.He would send children on messages which didn't make sense. Any excuse for a party.He especially liked Christmas partys.
